A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Probably the single worst Star Wars film to date\, including the prequels. And this is coming from someone that deeply enjoyed TFA. It didn't even feel like a Star Wars film\, it felt like a weird fever dream. There was so much in this movie that didn't make sense in the context of the rest of the series. If you must watch it\, wait for it to come out on DVD.
